com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.authentication

Interface AuthenticationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticationServiceImpl

    public interface AuthenticationService
    Service for making authentication requests to HP Haven OnDemand

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TokenProxy authenticateApplication(ApiKey apiKey, String applicationName, String domain, TokenType tokenType)
      Acquire a token for an application

      Acquire a token for a user in a given user store
      SignedRequest combinedGetRequest(Collection<String> allowedOrigins, AuthenticationToken token)
      Get a representation of a request for obtaining a list of applications and domains associated with the given unbound token.

      Get a representation of a request for obtaining a combined token from Haven OnDemand, specifying a user store.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticateApplication

        TokenProxy authenticateApplication(ApiKey apiKey,
                                 String applicationName,
                                 String domain,
                                 TokenType tokenType)
                                   throws HodErrorException
        Acquire a token for an application
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key of the application
        applicationName - The name of the application
        domain - The domain of the application
        tokenType - The type of the resulting token
        Returns:
        A token for use with HP Haven OnDemand
        Throws:
        HodErrorException

      • authenticateUser

        TokenProxy authenticateUser(ApiKey apiKey,
                          String applicationName,
                          String applicationDomain,
                          TokenType tokenType)
                            throws HodErrorException
        Acquire a token for a user
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key of the user
        applicationName - The name of the application
        applicationDomain - The domain of the application
        tokenType - The type of the resulting token
        Returns:
        A token for use with HP Haven OnDemand
        Throws:
        HodErrorException

      • authenticateUser

        TokenProxy authenticateUser(ApiKey apiKey,
                          String applicationName,
                          String applicationDomain,
                          TokenType tokenType,
                          String userStore,
                          String storeDomain)
                            throws HodErrorException
        Acquire a token for a user in a given user store
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key of the user
        applicationName - The name of the application
        applicationDomain - The domain of the application
        tokenType - The type of the resulting token
        userStore - The name of the user store
        storeDomain - The domain of the user store
        Returns:
        A token for use with HP Haven OnDemand
        Throws:
        HodErrorException

      • authenticateUnbound

        AuthenticationToken authenticateUnbound(ApiKey apiKey)
                                        throws HodErrorException
        Acquire an unbound application token for use with HP Haven OnDemand. This must be combined with an unbound user token before it can be used to query HP Haven OnDemand
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The application API key
        Returns:
        A response containing an unbound application token and a list of applications
        Throws:
        HodErrorException

      • getCombinedTokenDetails

        CombinedTokenDetails getCombinedTokenDetails(AuthenticationToken token)
                                             throws HodErrorException
        Verify a combined token and retrieve details for the application and the user.
        Parameters:
        token - The combined token
        Returns:
        Details about the application and user
        Throws:
        HodErrorException

      • combinedGetRequest

        SignedRequest combinedGetRequest(Collection<String> allowedOrigins,
                               AuthenticationToken token)
        Get a representation of a request for obtaining a list of applications and domains associated with the given unbound token. This request must then be made from a browser.
        Parameters:
        allowedOrigins - Origins from which this request may be sent
        token - The unbound token to use to sign the request
        Returns:
        A representation of an AJAX request to make from a browser

      • combinedRequest

        SignedRequest combinedRequest(Collection<String> allowedOrigins,
                            AuthenticationToken token,
                            String applicationDomain,
                            String applicationName,
                            TokenType tokenType)
        Get a representation of a request for obtaining a combined token from Haven OnDemand. This request must be made from a browser. No nonce is included.
        Parameters:
        allowedOrigins - Origins from which this request may be sent
        token - The unbound token to use to sign the request
        applicationDomain - Domain of the application
        applicationName - Name of the application
        tokenType - The type of the returned token
        Returns:
        A representation of an AJAX request to make from a browser

      • combinedRequest

        SignedRequest combinedRequest(Collection<String> allowedOrigins,
                            AuthenticationToken token,
                            String applicationDomain,
                            String applicationName,
                            String userStoreDomain,
                            String userStoreName,
                            TokenType tokenType)
        Get a representation of a request for obtaining a combined token from Haven OnDemand, specifying a user store. This request must be made from a browser. No nonce is included.
        Parameters:
        allowedOrigins - Origins from which this request may be sent
        token - The unbound token to use to sign the request
        applicationDomain - Domain of the application
        applicationName - Name of the application
        userStoreDomain - Domain of the user store
        userStoreName - Name of the user store
        tokenType - The type of the returned token
        Returns:
        A representation of an AJAX request to make from a browser

      • combinedRequest

        SignedRequest combinedRequest(Collection<String> allowedOrigins,
                            AuthenticationToken token,
                            String applicationDomain,
                            String applicationName,
                            String userStoreDomain,
                            String userStoreName,
                            TokenType tokenType,
                            boolean useNonce)
        Get a representation of a request for obtaining a combined token from Haven OnDemand, specifying a user store. This request must be made from a browser. A random unique nonce is included if useNonce is true.
        Parameters:
        allowedOrigins - Origins from which this request may be sent
        token - The unbound token to use to sign the request
        applicationDomain - Domain of the application
        applicationName - Name of the application
        userStoreDomain - Domain of the user store
        userStoreName - Name of the user store
        tokenType - The type of the returned token
        useNonce - If true, a nonce will be generated and included in the request
        Returns:
        A representation of an AJAX request to make from a browser
